string.description: A description of an action that a user of an accessibility service can perform to expand a bottomsheet halfway to its full height. [CHAR LIMIT=25]
string.name: bottomsheet_action_expand_halfway

string.description: The content description of bottom sheet drag handles [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: bottomsheet_drag_handle_content_description

string.description: A description of an accessibility action to expand the bottom sheet [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: bottomsheet_action_expand

string.description: A description of an accessibility action to collapse the bottom sheet [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: bottomsheet_action_collapse

string.description: An accessibility feedback when the bottom sheet drag handle is clicked [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: bottomsheet_drag_handle_clicked
